sentences.sentence: The parotid glands may appear normal in the early stages. Multiple small cysts in both parotids can be seen in the intermediate form of the disease.
sentences.translation: 在早期，腮腺可能表现为正常，在病变的中间过度期可能会出现双侧腮腺多发的小囊状影。

sentences.sentence: Result: Representation of punctate, sphere, cavity and destruction were seen in the parotids involvement by MR, so did few normal main duct and intraglandular ducts.
sentences.translation: 结果：在舍格伦综合征患者磁共振成像中可看到点状、球状、腔状及破坏性表现，少数有正常的主导管和分支导管表现；
